name: BlockHelper
description: The BlockHelper class is a World Interaction helper in JSMacros that provides access to Minecraft block properties and behaviors.
overview:
The BlockHelper class is a World Interaction helper in JSMacros that provides access to Minecraft block properties and behaviors. It wraps Minecraft's native Block class and exposes various methods for retrieving block information such as hardness, resistance, states, and other properties that are useful for scripting.

This class is typically accessed when working with blocks in the world, either through block events or by querying specific block positions.

You typically get BlockHelper instances from:
- Block-related events
- World block queries
- Interactions with block states and positions

methods.name: getRaw
methods.description: Returns the underlying Minecraft Block object.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the block identifier as a string.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the display name of the block as a TextHelper.
examples:
const blockName = blockHelper.getName();
Chat.log("Block name: " + blockName.getString());

methods.name: getDefaultState
methods.description: Returns the default state of the block as a BlockStateHelper.

methods.name: getStates
methods.description: Returns all possible block states of the block as a list of BlockStateHelper objects.
examples:
const allStates = blockHelper.getStates();
Chat.log("Total states: " + allStates.length);

methods.name: getDefaultItemStack
methods.description: Returns the default item stack representation of the block as an ItemStackHelper.

methods.name: getHardness
methods.description: Returns the hardness value of the block (how long it takes to mine).
examples:
const hardness = blockHelper.getHardness();
Chat.log("Block hardness: " + hardness);

methods.name: getBlastResistance
methods.description: Returns the blast resistance value of the block.
examples:
const resistance = blockHelper.getBlastResistance();
Chat.log("Blast resistance: " + resistance);

methods.name: getSlipperiness
methods.description: Returns the slipperiness factor of the block.

methods.name: getJumpVelocityMultiplier
methods.description: Returns the jump velocity multiplier when jumping on this block.
examples:
const jumpMultiplier = blockHelper.getJumpVelocityMultiplier();
Chat.log("Jump multiplier: " + jumpMultiplier);

methods.name: getVelocityMultiplier
methods.description: Returns the velocity multiplier for entities walking on this block.
examples:
const velocityMultiplier = blockHelper.getVelocityMultiplier();
Chat.log("Velocity multiplier: " + velocityMultiplier);

methods.name: hasDynamicBounds
methods.description: Returns true if the block has dynamic bounds (bounds that change based on state).

methods.name: canMobSpawnInside
methods.description: Returns true if mobs can spawn inside this block.

methods.name: getTags
methods.description: Returns all tags associated with the block as a list of strings.
